name: Risk Advisory
desc: In the current landscape, where corporate governance is under scrutiny by regulators, investors, and independent directors, organizations are compelled to enhance their operational efficiency and risk management. In response, leadership teams are increasingly turning to their internal auditors for both system robustness assurance and risk mitigation strategies.

features.text: Our IA team comprises forward-thinking professionals from diverse industries, ensuring that we possess the requisite business insights and best practices to cater to the unique needs of our clients.

We specialize in proactive risk mitigation, establishing resilient processes, institutionalizing effective internal controls, harnessing the power of technology, and achieving performance enhancements.

With the digital transformation of businesses, the generation of data has surged across all operational domains. In line with this trend, our internal audit (IA) approach seamlessly incorporates data analytics to deliver heightened efficiency, assurance, and value.

featuresdesc: At KAARES, we provide a comprehensive range of services to assist businesses in managing their risks and ensuring compliance. Our services span across various domains including Risk Advisory / Internal Audit, Risk Assessments / Risk Control Matrix (RCM), SOPs Development, Income Tax / Tax Audit, GST / Goods and Service Tax Audit, Operational Audits, Stock Audit, and CSR Audit.

Our professionals, at Kaares, are committed to inspire greater confidence and trust to the stakeholders with a transparency and detailed understanding of the business.

name: Business Valuation
desc: Business valuation is an essential tool to assess both the opportunities as well as opportunity costs in future if the business is planning for future growth or even for transition. It’s required for business owners to evaluate their business as well as for investors who are willing to invest in the business. We, at Kaares, with the help of our specialised professionals provide business valuation to the clients and also guide them on how to improve their valuations in case there are any weaknesses in the business.

features.text: Thorough Due Diligence and Structured Evaluation

featuresdesc: In the ever-changing global services landscape, it is critical to recognize the actual worth of your company. It gives you the ability to protect your money, take advantage of growth opportunities, and make well-informed decisions. Kares is your reliable travel companion, offering professional business valuation and financial modelling services to steer you in the direction of a profitable future.

otherservices.title: Valuation Services
points: Business Valuation: Determining the economic value of a business or company using various approaches.
Valuation for Merger/Acquisition: Determining the fair price or value of the target company using various methods.
ESOP Valuation for Accounting or Taxation purposes: Assisting in determining strike prices for ESOPs and carrying out the valuation of options.
Intangible Valuation: Determining the value of a company’s intangible assets.
Goodwill and Asset Impairment Testing (US GAAP/IFRS/Indian GAAP): Reviewing annual goodwill impairment.
Purchase Price Allocation: Assisting in the fair value allocation of assets and liabilities acquired in a transaction.
Valuation for regulatory compliances (e.g. Income Tax, Companies Act, FEMA, IFRS, etc): Assisting in assessing the fair value of a business for various regulatory compliances.
Valuation for Restructuring/Reorganization: Determining the value of a company or business unit before and after restructuring or reorganization.
